Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.name: wrappedValue
Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.abstract: The optional wrapped value - changing the value will trigger validation.

Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.name: init(wrappedValue:required:_:)
Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.abstract: A convenience initialiser that takes a variadic list of validators and automatically combines them into a single validator.

Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.name: init(required:_:)
Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.abstract: A convenience initialiser that doesn’t require an initial wrappedValue.

Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.name: init(required:_:)
Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.abstract: A convenience initialiser that doesn’t require an initial wrappedValue.

Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.name: subscript(dynamicMember:)
Structs/OptionalValidating.html#/s:11Val.abstract: Provides dynamic access to the underlying validated value’s properties.

Structs/Validating.html#/s:11Validations.name: wrappedValue
Structs/Validating.html#/s:11Validations.abstract: The wrapped value - changing the value will trigger validation.

Structs/Validating.html#/s:11Validations.name: init(wrappedValue:_:)
Structs/Validating.html#/s:11Validations.abstract: A convenience initialiser that takes a variadic list of validators and automatically combines them into a single validator.

Structs/Validating.html#/s:11Validations.name: subscript(dynamicMember:)
Structs/Validating.html#/s:11Validations.abstract: Provides dynamic access to the underlying validated value’s properties.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: Validator
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: A closure type that encapsulates validation logic.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: validate
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: The validate function. Call this as a function to perform validation on a given value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: init(validate:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Initialises an instance with the given Validator closure.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: pullback(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Returns a new validator derived from self that operates on values of type LocalValue.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: optional(errorOnNil:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Returns a new optional validator that operates on Value? instead of Value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: negated(withError:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Returns a validator that is the logical inverse of self.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: mapErrors(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Returns a new validator whose errors are transformed by the provided closure.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: combine(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Composes multiple validators into a single validator.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: combine(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Composes an array of validators into a single validator.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isTrue
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a boolean value is true.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isFalse
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a boolean value is false.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: hasLengthOf(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates the collection’s count against the given numeric validator.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: hasLengthOf(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates the collection’s count is exactly the given value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: contains(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validate that the collection contains the given element.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isAtLeast(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value >= the given value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isAtMost(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is <= the given value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isLessThan(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is < the given value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isGreaterThan(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is > the given value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isInRange(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is within the given range.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isInRange(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is within the given range.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isIncluded(in:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is in a given collection.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isExcluded(from:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is not in a given collection.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isIncluded(in:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is in a given collection.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isExcluded(from:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is not in a given collection.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isEqualTo(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that value is equal to another value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isExactly(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that the value is exactly the given amount.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isEven
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is even.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isOdd
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a value is odd.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: beginsWith(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a string starts with a given prefix.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: endsWith(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a string ends with a given suffix.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: itsLength(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that the string’s length matches the given numeric validator.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: hasLengthOf(_:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that the string’s length is equal to the given length.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: matchesPattern(_:as:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a string matches the given pattern.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isEmpty
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that string is an empty string (i.e. "").

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: isNotEmpty
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Validates that a string is non-empty.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.name: optional(allowNil:)
Structs/ValidatorOf.html#/s:11Validation.abstract: Returns a new optional validator that operates on Value? instead of Value.

Structs/ValidatorOf.html.name: ValidatorOf
Structs/ValidatorOf.html.abstract: A type that acts as a generic wrapper around a validate function.

Structs/Validating.html.name: Validating
Structs/Validating.html.abstract: A type that wraps a value of type Value and an associated validator and re-validates every time value is updated.

Structs/OptionalValidating.html.name: OptionalValidating
Structs/OptionalValidating.html.abstract: A type that wraps an optional of type Value and an associated validator and re-validates every time the value is updated.
